summary: November 28 2018: Tumblr names Critical Role #10 on its top fandom list.  November 29 2018: Tumblr erases the main Critical Role...
body:
November 28 2018: Tumblr names Critical Role #10 on its top fandom list. 

November 29 2018: Tumblr erases the main Critical Role tag from search.

Great work Tumblr. Just outstanding.

tags: like the obvious direction mercer is gonna take this arc is caleb learning to accept what he was manipulated into doing by trent
that while he did murder his parents he was manipulated & abused into doing so by an authority figure who he trusted
summary: That post about how Caleb’s arc is likely going to be him going from Sad Depressed Schlub to Happier Schlub over the course of...
body:
That post about how Caleb’s arc is likely going to be him going from Sad Depressed Schlub to Happier Schlub over the course of the Campaing just reminds me of those folks who I’d see complaining that Liam is somehow copying Percy from last campaign because both characters have trauma stemming from their murdered families? Because Taliesin is apparently the only person whose allowed to have murdered parents as a character backstory?

Cause let’s be real murdered family trauma is basically where the similarities between those two start and stop.

reblog.comment:
That post about how Caleb’s arc is likely going to be him going from Sad Depressed Schlub to Happier Schlub over the course of the Campaing just reminds me of those folks who I’d see complaining that Liam is somehow copying Percy from last campaign because both characters have trauma stemming from their murdered families? Because Taliesin is apparently the only person whose allowed to have murdered parents as a character backstory?

Cause let’s be real murdered family trauma is basically where the similarities between those two start and stop.

trail.content_raw:
That post about how Caleb’s arc is likely going to be him going from Sad Depressed Schlub to Happier Schlub over the course of the Campaing just reminds me of those folks who I’d see complaining that Liam is somehow copying Percy from last campaign because both characters have trauma stemming from their murdered families? Because Taliesin is apparently the only person whose allowed to have murdered parents as a character backstory?

Cause let’s be real murdered family trauma is basically where the similarities between those two start and stop.
trail.content:
That post about how Caleb’s arc is likely going to be him going from Sad Depressed Schlub to Happier Schlub over the course of the Campaing just reminds me of those folks who I’d see complaining that Liam is somehow copying Percy from last campaign because both characters have trauma stemming from their murdered families? Because Taliesin is apparently the only person whose allowed to have murdered parents as a character backstory?

Cause let’s be real murdered family trauma is basically where the similarities between those two start and stop.

summary: @staff I am pissed off beyond belief, my fandom just got deleted by the algorithm that's supposed to be for actual criminal...
body: @staff I am pissed off beyond belief, my fandom just got deleted by the algorithm that’s supposed to be for actual criminal content. Critical Role just made your top ten list, what is wrong with you? How many fan artists who use that tag to showcase their work are going to lose out on money because of this? How many people LOST artwork because of this?

reblog.comment: @staff I am pissed off beyond belief, my fandom just got deleted by the algorithm that’s supposed to be for actual criminal content. Critical Role just made your top ten list, what is wrong with you? How many fan artists who use that tag to showcase their work are going to lose out on money because of this? How many people LOST artwork because of this?
